level.heading: Boards of Behavioral Health executive director.
level.text: The Mayor shall appoint an executive director, who shall be a full-time employee of the District, to implement and administer the orders of the Boards of Behavioral Health in accordance with this chapter and rules and regulations issued pursuant to this chapter.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition, see ยง 2(c) of Health Occupations Revision General Amendment Emergency Act of 2009 (D.C. Act 18-146, July 28, 2009, 56 DCR 6308).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-26
level.text: For Law 18-26, see notes following ยง 3-1201.01.
